title: Alpha Client Bug?
body:
Hi, I tried to ban a champion in the new client, but when I tried to ban Malzahar, the client didn't let me ban the champion. The red ban button didn't show up and Malzahar's symbol had a small loading circle on top of it. I couldn't ban the champ and I got a penalty for dodging. 

Laptop settings:
macOS Sierra
MacBook Air (13-inch, Early 2015)
1.6 GHz Intel Core i5
Macintosh HD
Intel HD Graphics 6000 1536 MB

Thanks for the help!

replies.body: I'm not up to date on alpha issues, but the community may be able to help out as well as receive feedback through the [alpha boards](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work).  In the meantime, just in general it sounds like you might be having network problems, so a poor connection can cause you to lose sync in champion select.  Personally, I'd suggest using the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get that fixed up.  Make sure to select Mac for instructions specific to your OS.  Hope that helps!
